messages.message:
Hey team,
The `Hub` can is pretty messy fast when you’ve got lots of users.
Is there anything in the roadmap to be able to group / tag / search apps?
For example @leila.tan and I wanted to find the “Ask People UK HR” app. But we had to do a `cmd + F`  on the web page, but because of Lazy loading, it doesn’t show.
I think for organisations, it would be interesting to be able to group and elevate specific apps based on the user. Perhaps allowing admins to create custom groups/tags:

i’ve always wanted a search bar on this page too :sweat_smile:

@alagu @Jessica are there any plans for changing / re-designing this page?
Yes! We are planning to redesign the hub later this month
We can def add a search bard for now if the effort is minimal on the eng side
I think not having a search bar is a technical constraint right now - the backend only allows searching for apps using the the full, case sensitive name. Not something we want to expose!
@Adam who should we talk to about getting actual search functionality for this endpoint? And how hard do you think it will be to add? I assume there's a ticket for it floating around somewhere
Yeah the lack of search is a BE API gap right now. @andy where should apps questions go after I leave this week?

! I’m glad its not just me! @Serena

Any chance of getting sight of the redesigns when they come out?
We could add the search bar at any point regardless of the new designs, but we just don't have the backend capabilities to do so
Also… There should be a Favourites / Pinned apps section
agreed with alagu that we can explore the redesign here with the overall hub + app view redesign later this month
